title: Correct Hindi spelling: वैशेलिया to वैचेलिया

requirements.text: Update all instances of 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर' to 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' throughout the frontend application, including the Header component logo text, HomePage hero section heading, and translations utility file

quotes: change वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर to वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर

acceptanceCriteria: Header component displays 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the logo text
HomePage hero section shows 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the main heading
All translations in utils/translations.ts use 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' instead of 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर'
No instances of the old spelling 'वैशेलिया' remain in the codebase

constraints: Only change the Hindi spelling; do not modify the English text 'Vachellia Psychocare'
Maintain the same styling and layout as the current implementation
nonGoals: Modifying the logo design or layout
Updating any other translations beyond this specific spelling correction
